citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30am on 24-AUG-
21. The inspector spoke to a household member who stated no one was available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

21.  The inspector spoke to a household member who stated no one was available for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
